Package de.uni_hannover.hci.task2

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_hannover.hci.task2.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Ladybug Game. So far this class does not handle Clover so far. While this class has an goal point, nothing happens yet, when the Ladybug enters the goal.

    • Constructor Summary

      Standard constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game​(int width,
            int height,
            int startX,
            int startY,
            int endX,
            int endY,
            Direction initialDirection)
        Standard constructor. Initializes all necessary parameters.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the playing board (max x + 1)
        height - Height of the playing board (max y + 1)
        startX - Initial x coordinate of the player.
        startY - Initial y coordinate of the player.
        endX - Goal x coordinate.
        endY - Goal y coordinate.
        initialDirection - Initial direction of the player.

    • Method Detail

      • toggleTree

        public void toggleTree​(int x,
                       int y,
                       boolean treePresent)
        Place and remove trees onto the playing board.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate.
        y - Y coordinate.
        treePresent - True to place tree, false to remove tree.
